name: SnekMP
description:
Compete with your friends in the most brutal(no) snek fight in the history of mankind!


Show who has the largest Snek from your company!
Grow your snek by eating food pellets !


The first Snek to reach a size of 15 blocks wins!

Don't know how to handle a big, fat snek?
No worries, if you can't win, make your opponent lose! Ez Pz
